textTemplates.name: tpl_ProductOffering
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, text_package_id__c from Product_Offering__c where Product_Type__c = '{!Product_Type}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_query_product_offering
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, text_package_id__c from Product_Offering__c where Product_Type__c = '{!Product_Type}'
